enWisdom: Death is the reaper of hope
When death comes, hopes are exposed

Wisdom: إِذَا بَلَغْتُمْ نِهَايَةَ الْآمَالِ فَاذْكُرُوا بَغَتَاتِ الْآجَالِ
enWisdom: When you reach the end of your hopes, then remember the suddenness of death
When death arrives, hopes are exposed
Sometimes death is [hidden] beneath an aspiration
The reality of death exposes the lie of [false] aspiration

Wisdom: عِنْدَ حُضُورِ الْآجَالِ تَظْهَرُ خَيْبَةُ الْآمَالِ
enWisdom: It is when [the time of] death comes that the failure of [one’s] aspirations become apparent

Wisdom: عِنْدَ هُجُومِ الْآجَالِ تَفْتَضِحُ الْأَمَانِيُّ وَالْآمَالُ
enWisdom: When death strikes, hopes and aspirations are exposed

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ لَا يَمْلِكُ أَجَلَهُ كَيْفَ يُطِيلُ أَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: I wonder at the one who has no control over his death, how can he lengthen his hopes?
The end of hope is death

Wisdom: قَصِّرُوا الْأَمَلَ وَخَافُوا بَغْتَةَ الْأَجَلِ وَبَادِرُوا صَالِحَ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: Reduce your hopes, fear the suddenness of death and hasten towards performing good deeds

Wisdom: وَافِدُ الْمَوْتِ يَقْطَعُ الْعَمَلَ وَيَفْضَحُ الْأَمَلَ
enWisdom: The arrival of death cuts off action and exposes [false] hopes

Wisdom: وَافِدُ الْمَوْتِ يُبِيدُ الْمَهَلَ وَيُدْنِي الْأَجَلَ وَيُقْعِدُ الْأَمَلَ
enWisdom: The arrival of death expunges respite, brings the appointed time closer and dashes [one’s] hope
